# Task ID: 96
# Title: Implement Review Assistant and Quiz Generation
# Status: done
# Dependencies: 95 (Not found)
# Priority: medium
# Description: Enable users to review lessons via summaries, concept extraction, and auto-generated quizzes from lesson content.
# Details:
Add commands ('Cosa ho imparato oggi?', 'Spiegami [concept]'). Use GPT-4 to extract concepts and generate quizzes. Display results in child-friendly format.

# Test Strategy:
Review lesson, extract concepts, generate quiz. Validate relevance and clarity.
